name: 2kings
text: ninja turtles could do it.

name: arkher
text: But then you'd just have an empty pizza box.

name: bron
text: It's hard being a stuffed animal these days.

name: saint
text:
Smelling salts are on the counter next to the radio.

help yourself.

name: mortshire
text: i'm glad these weird "sentient stuffed animals have a hard time of things in the human world" have kind of fallen by the wayside.

name: jokercross
text: I like this strip, but on the whole, I got to agree with you.

name: ralgnar
text: Hypothesis: They met Ray and the other cats and discovered the Underground (run by cats of course). Thereafter there was no reason for them to have a hard time of things.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: Well, I doubt Onstad really planned it out that way, but I'd say that's a very effective rationalization.

name: epicurus
text: I second fuckyoufriday's sentiment verbatim.

name: rotating-dog
text: Third'd. A good way to think about it.

name: em2
text: Fourth'd. Or, for you math geeks, tetra'd

name: coffeecoaster
text: Quinto'd?

name: mattylite
text: SEXED.

name: snowman
text: You win the No-Prize!

name: aljazeera
text: I have a second hypothesis.  Maybe this was all before Ray became extremely rich.  After all of his money came and the piano deal made him the multi-platinum artist, he just used surrogates for all of his affairs with the human world.  And the internet.  Ebay became their best friend.

name: sparhawk
text: I dunno, Ray still pits deliverymen against each other in grisly porch-side battle royale every once in a while....

name: ich_bin_ilya
text: strip reminds me of calvin and hobbes for some reason

name: howl
text: they do order pizza when home alone, and try to rent videos.

name: godfatherofsouls
text: ordering was always like this before that shoe taught them the proper way to do it

name: farqussus
text: what shoe?

name: godfatherofsouls
text: This shoe.

name: echidnaboy
text: Chubbied for pertinent linkage.

name: ford
text: Is it weird that I'm proud of the fact that i knew which shoe without the link, and also what his brother's name was?

name: ushiewhispaz
text: The "Home Alone" approach.

name: gournal
text: If Lyle had a copy of "Angels With Filthy Souls"(as he should) this strip would have a happy ending.

name: hyetal
text: Lyle is too upset to even scowl.

name: luckypyjamas
text: where did they get that tiny phonebook?

name: al_batross
text:
Peppers?

I had at the very least Lyle pegged as a black olive man. Clearly the inconsistencies in these early strips is too vast.

name: starch
text: This is similar to the way rachel ray's husband has to get pizza delivered.

name: autrepoupee
text: isnt this style of pizza called dark pizza ?

name: chachibenji
text:
If you promise them something like a five dollar tip you can get some Pizza Hut employees to do this.
I speak from experience.

name: babeeazz
text: the pizza delivery people i know would be too stoned to care that they're hanging out with live stuffed animals.

name: wonglers
text: I am pretty sure a pizza delivery boy would have no qualms about doing this.

name: zapatos
text: The delivery boy wouldn't care, but maybe his manager took the call and is being a jerk?
